TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 554
TEI.2.document_title: Wyly Martin to Stephen F Austin, 12-14-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Wyly Martin to Austin, December 14, 1830. Asking Austin to help him obtain from the Government an additional league of land for a stock farm. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 554

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Wyly Martin to Austin, December 14, 1830. Asking Austin to help him obtain from the Government an additional league of land for a stock farm. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**location_mentioned*San Felipe,*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="12-14-1830"> December 14, 1830*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
